item.description:
The Sounds of Concord will be working on new songs in our repertoire. You can learn also!

There will be tag singing also - the most fun 10 seconds that you can have with your voice and ears!

We will be bringing in some top-class vocal and presentation coaches to get ready for the busy fall season. You can benefit from what they teach.

It's easy to get to - right near where Route 2 meets Route 128 in Lexington.

Three fabulous weeks with more details to follow.

Why sit home when you can get both singing and air-conditioning!

group.name: Boston Area Acapella Barbershop Quartet/Chorus Singing

item.name: Dog days of summer - time to sing better!
